title: Discover the origins and evolution of PL/I.
description: Learn how PL/I shaped modern mainframe programming.

theory.content:
Welcome to the theory section for Overview in Discover the origins and evolution of PL/I.

This section covers the essential theoretical knowledge you need to master Overview. You'll learn about the core concepts, best practices, and important principles that form the foundation of this topic.

Take your time to read through the material carefully. Understanding the theory is crucial before moving on to practical exercises.
keyConcepts: Understanding the fundamental principles and concepts
